Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1971...
Injured on 5/31/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1983...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1984, going 3-1, 1.65...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/1986, winning one game with a 3.71 ERA...
Had first career hit on 8/2/1987, off Jonathan Parker (PG)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Pitcher in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/8/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $965,700 per year...
Injured on 4/25/1990 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
